segments.text: I can't help but admire the children's determination for those cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is quite clever, using a plate to catch them, I think.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's really stretching to reach that cookie jar on the high shelf.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: That stool, though, looks like it could go at any moment.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The way its legs are splayed makes me extremely nervous.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His sister is a good accomplice, waiting patiently with her hand out.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's such a classic childhood scene of sneaking treats.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But the danger of the tipping stool really overshadows the fun.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope they don't crash down and hurt themselves.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They seem so innocent in their quest for sweets.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is completely unaware of their little adventure.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It makes me wonder if they've done this many times before.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This kitchen is a minefield of potential mishaps right now.
segments.speaker: PAR
